creator: Tecmark LLC
descriptionHtml:
Enjoy exclusive member deals and rewards at Buchiki’s with this FREE mobile app! Download the Buchiki's Rewards app today and instantly begin earning points for purchases in store and at the pump.

At Buchiki's, it’s our mission to provide paramount customer service in an exciting convenience store setting. As the latest convenience store operator in the state of Louisiana, we are excited to introduce fresh food and beverage options that are uniquely ours. From signature deli and juice bar items to the latest in turn-key beverages, we are committed to providing the largest selection and the best quality products on the market. We’re here for our customers and want each one of them to have a unique, one-of-a-kind experience that only Buchiki's can provide.


How it works:
• Use your cell phone number as your Buchiki Rewards loyalty identifier
• Earn points on all qualifying purchases
• View available loyalty benefits
• Select how you like to receive offers: app, text, or email
• Find your nearest Buchiki location
• Share your feedback and ideas

Download today and start saving!

Buchiki’s …. ESCAPE THE ROAD
